title: CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page Â» IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see an IMAGE gallery for each CAR MODEL VARIANT\
So I can find out what differences there are visually between multiple variants
description:
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page contains a section with a list of all connected IMAGES.
* Each IMAGE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each IMAGE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each IMAGE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no IMAGE connected to the CAR MODEL VARIANT then the section is not displayed at all.
